title: Espresso, banana and almond smoothie
description: This 2-minute wonder smoothie recipe is not only delicious, but brings a massive boost of fibre and protein to your day.
ingredients: ½ tbsp espresso powder mixed with ½ tbsp boiling water (or 1 shot freshly brewed espresso)
2 tbsp almond butter (we like Pip & Nut)

method.Step 1: Put all the ingredients except the ice into a blender and whizz until smooth. Add the ice and whizz again until crushed.
